column1: #text=Two weeks ago I went on a vacation to Florida .
#text=Getting there meant having to fly in an airplane !
#text=I arranged for a friend to drive me to the airport , and drop me off at the door near check in .
#text=I pulled a suitcase on wheels behind me and swung my small carry on bag over my shoulder .
#text=Once inside I followed signs and made my way to my airlines luggage drop off area .
#text=A man weight my suitcase , put a sticker on it , and whisked it out of my sight .
#text=Then I printed a boarding pass and made my way to the security line .
#text=There I waited until my turn , showed the security agent my ID card and went to the walk through metal detector .
#text=Finally , I could make my way to my gate where I waited to be called to board .
#text=Once on board the plane I found my seat number and settled in comfortably .
#text=Before I knew it we were in the air .
#text=A flight attendant gave me a soda , and I relaxed watching a movie until we finally landed in Florida three hours later .
